programs.name: ENERGY STAR for New Homes
programs.outcome: Requires blower door testing; homes must achieve ≤2.5 ACH50 for certification

programs.outcome: Pioneered airtightness testing in North America; requires ≤1.5 ACH50

programs.name: Passive House Standard
programs.outcome: Requires ≤0.6 ACH50; buildings typically achieve 75-90% energy reduction vs conventional
